Table.sql: SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibvmmyy.benhanpk c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.maicd=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibv.benhanngtr c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.maicdrv=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibvmmyy.benhancc c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.maicdrv=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibv.benhandt c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibv.benhandt b,medibv.nhapkhoa c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and b.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibv.nhapkhoa b,medibv.xuatkhoa c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f,medibv.benhandt e WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.id=c.id and b.maql=e.maql and e.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM medibv.btdbn a,medibv.benhandt b,medibv.xuatvien c,medibv.bctheonhomicd d, medibv.dm_nhombcicd10 f WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and b.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma and d.idnhom=f.id
